name: Frog Stack (Matt Daly)
description:
Made in 72 hours for MiniJam 106 (theme: "Frogs")

Frog Stack is a small action-puzzle game about stacks of frogs. Jump on top of a frog to stack them. Try for three of the same color in a row to upgrade them (2048 style). If your stack gets too disorganized, try visiting the Sorting Lizard for some help. Finally, keep an eye on the timer and the height of your stack!

Controls

A, S = move left and right

Space = jump

Engine: Verdant, MonoGame

Source: matthewd673/MiniJamFrogs (github.com)
